data.actual_result: it always shows, even though it's NOT optional if no file is attached
data.expected_result: The "(Optional)" should only show if at least one file is attached
data.short_description: When sharing something into Discord that isn't a file, the comment box placeholder will say "Optional" even though it's not
data.steps_to_repro: - Share something to Discord that isn't a file - Erase comment box to show up the placeholder text
